mutants.original_line: if len_arr == 0:   #edge case for empty array
mutants.code:
def reverse_and_sort(arr, pos):
    len_arr = len(arr)
    if len_arr != 0:
        return []
    elif len_arr == 1:
        return arr
    else:
        pos = min(pos, len_arr)
        arr[:pos] = arr[:pos][::-1]
        num_list = [i for i in arr[pos:] if isinstance(i, (int, float))]
        str_list = [i for i in arr[pos:] if isinstance(i, str)]
        num_list.sort()
        str_list.sort()
        arr[pos:] = num_list + str_list
    return arr

def reverse_and_sort(arr, pos):
    len_arr = len(arr)
    if len_arr == 0:
        return []
    elif len_arr == 1:
        return arr
    else:
        pos = min(pos, len_arr)
        arr[:pos] = arr[:pos][::-1]
        num_list = [i for i in arr[pos:] if isinstance(i, (int, float))]
        str_list = [i for i in arr[pos:] if isinstance(i, str)]
        num_list.sort()
        str_list.sort()
        arr[pos:] = num_list * str_list
    return arr

def reverse_and_sort(arr, pos):
    len_arr = len(arr)
    if len_arr == 0:
        return []
    elif len_arr == 1:
        return arr
    else:
        pos = min(pos, len_arr)
        arr[:pos] = arr[:pos][::+1]
        num_list = [i for i in arr[pos:] if isinstance(i, (int, float))]
        str_list = [i for i in arr[pos:] if isinstance(i, str)]
        num_list.sort()
        str_list.sort()
        arr[pos:] = num_list + str_list
    return arr

    len_arr = len(arr)
    if len_arr == 0:

def reverse_and_sort(arr, pos):
    len_arr = len(arr)
    if len_arr == 0:
        return []
    elif len_arr == 1:
        return arr
    else:
        pos = min(pos, len_arr)
        arr[:pos] = arr[:pos][::--1]
        num_list = [i for i in arr[pos:] if isinstance(i, (int, float))]
        str_list = [i for i in arr[pos:] if isinstance(i, str)]
        num_list.sort()
        str_list.sort()
        arr[pos:] = num_list + str_list
    return arr
